scripts.dev: npm run build -w @crocdesk/shared && concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:desktop"
scripts.dev:desktop:embedded: npm run build -w @crocdesk/shared && npm run build -w @crocdesk/server && npm run build -w @crocdesk/web && npm run rebuild -w @crocdesk/desktop && npm run build -w @crocdesk/desktop && npm run dev:embedded -w @crocdesk/desktop
scripts.build: npm run build -w @crocdesk/shared && npm run build -w @crocdesk/server && npm run build -w @crocdesk/web && npm run build -w @crocdesk/desktop
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w @crocdesk/shared && npm run typecheck -w @crocdesk/server && npm run typecheck -w @crocdesk/web && npm run typecheck -w @crocdesk/desktop
scripts.package:desktop: npm run build && npm run rebuild -w @crocdesk/desktop && npm run package -w @crocdesk/desktop
scripts.package:desktop:all: npm run build && npm run rebuild -w @crocdesk/desktop && npm run package:win -w @crocdesk/desktop && npm run package:mac -w @crocdesk/desktop && npm run package:linux -w @crocdesk/desktop
